title: How to Defrost Chicken and Meat | Ask the Expert
description:
Do you know the best way to defrost chicken and meat? Marge Perry gives you her tips in this week's Ask the Expert.
See our 25 most popular chicken recipes here: http://www.myrecipes.com/ingredients/chicken-recipes/most-popular-chicken-recipes-10000001934338/
subtitles: a bunch of you have written in and asked the best way to defrost meat or chicken the answer is not the microwave which actually cooks it from the outside in so it's still frozen in the center by the time it's thought outside the best way to do it is to put your meat in a plastic zip-top bag and immerse it in ice-cold water and change that water every 20 to 30 minutes and break apart the meat if you can at all as it starts to thaw that way you'll have nice evenly thawed mea bunch of you have written in and asked the best way to defrost meat or chicken the answer is not the microwave which actually cooks it from the outside in so it's still frozen in the center by the time it's thought outside the best way to do it is to put your meat in a plastic zip-top bag and immerse it in ice-cold water and change that water every 20 to 30 minutes and break apart the meat if you can at all as it starts to thaw that way you'll have nice evenly thawed me

title: How to Dewax Lemons
description:
Learn how to dewax lemons with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Dewax-Lemons

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: you may want to D wax your lemons to remove the glossy layer on the skin before cooking a meal or mixing a cocktail to D wax lemons first fill a tea kettle or pot with water place the pot or kettle on the stove and heat it over high heat until it reaches a boil while you're waiting get a strainer or colander and set your lemons inside place the colon dur or strainer over your sink once the water is boiling remove the pot or kettle and slowly pour the water over your lemons then turn some cold water on and run it over the lemons after 10 to 15 seconds pick your first lemon up and brush each side with a clean vegetable brush rinse the lemon set it aside to dry and begin scrubbing the remaining lemons once your lemons are dry inspect their texture to make sure you removed all of the wax you can repeat this process if necessary to get rid of the waxy textureyou may want to D wax your lemons to remove the glossy layer on the skin before cooking a meal or mixing a cocktail to D wax lemons first fill a tea kettle or pot with water place the pot or kettle on the stove and heat it over high heat until it reaches a boil while you're waiting get a strainer or colander and set your lemons inside place the colon dur or strainer over your sink once the water is boiling remove the pot or kettle and slowly pour the water over your lemons then turn some cold water on and run it over the lemons after 10 to 15 seconds pick your first lemon up and brush each side with a clean vegetable brush rinse the lemon set it aside to dry and begin scrubbing the remaining lemons once your lemons are dry inspect their texture to make sure you removed all of the wax you can repeat this process if necessary to get rid of the waxy texture

subtitles: two dice a tomato first place the tomato on its side on a cutting board then use a serrated knife to cut the tomato into evenly spaced slices working your way from the stem end to the bottom the thinner the slices the smaller the dice will be discard the stem and bottom ends stack the slices on top of each other then cut the slices into evenly spaced strips finally make evenly spaced cuts across the strips to dice the tomato into small cubes be sure to practice knife safetytwo dice a tomato first place the tomato on its side on a cutting board then use a serrated knife to cut the tomato into evenly spaced slices working your way from the stem end to the bottom the thinner the slices the smaller the dice will be discard the stem and bottom ends stack the slices on top of each other then cut the slices into evenly spaced strips finally make evenly spaced cuts across the strips to dice the tomato into small cubes be sure to practice knife safety

title: How to Do Space Buns
description:
Space buns are a popular trend from the '90s that are making their way back! While they are not exactly the same as the iconic buns worn by Princess Leia in Star Wars, you can use the techniques in this wikiHow to recreate a similar look. Once you know how to do basic space buns, you can try different variations, such as half-up space buns, braided space buns, and even a multi-tier look like Star Wars' Rey!

Read more: https://www.wikihow.com/Do-Space-Buns

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to put your hair in space buns first part your hair down the middle then tie each half of your hair into a pigtail using hair ties twist one of the pigtails with both hands to make it tighter the tighter you twist your hair the smaller and firmer your space buns will be next wrap the twisted hair around the base of the pigtail several times until you have about four inches 10 centimeters of hair left tuck the end of your pigtail underneath the bun you've just made and secure the bun by sticking a bobby pin through the end of your hair where it tucks under the bun repeat this process with your other pigtail finally spray your space buns with hairspray to help them stay in placeto put your hair in space buns first part your hair down the middle then tie each half of your hair into a pigtail using hair ties twist one of the pigtails with both hands to make it tighter the tighter you twist your hair the smaller and firmer your space buns will be next wrap the twisted hair around the base of the pigtail several times until you have about four inches 10 centimeters of hair left tuck the end of your pigtail underneath the bun you've just made and secure the bun by sticking a bobby pin through the end of your hair where it tucks under the bun repeat this process with your other pigtail finally spray your space buns with hairspray to help them stay in place

title: How to Drink Apple Cider Vinegar
description:

subtitles: drinking apple cider vinegar may be able to help with weight loss blood sugar levels and digestion to use apple cider vinegar for weight loss drink one to two tablespoons 15 to 30 milliliters mixed with a glass of water daily this can make you feel fuller and eat less throughout the day which can aid in weight loss you can also drink apple cider vinegar before a high carb meal to prevent a blood sugar spike just mix four teaspoons 20 milliliters into a small glass of water and drink it before your meal this will slow down the rate that your stomach empties and improve your insulin sensitivity which can lower your blood sugar levels and prevent spikes some people also find that drinking one to two tablespoons 15 to 30 milliliters of apple cider vinegar mixed into a glass of water before a meal helps with digestion possibly by increasing the acidity of the stomach whatever you're drinking apple cider vinegar for make sure you dilute it with water first so it doesn't title: How to Drink Wine | wikiHow Asks a Certified Wine Consultant
description:
Learn more about how to drink wine properly from certified wine consultant, Murphy Perng. Read more in this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Drink-Wine

---
Murphy Perng is a Wine Consultant and the Founder and Host of Matter of Wine, a business that produces educational wine events, including team-building experiences and networking events. Based in Los Angeles, California, Murphy has collaborated with brands such as Equinox, Buzzfeed, WeWork, and Stage & Table, to name a few. Murphy possesses her WSET (Wine & Spirit Education Trust) Level 3 Advanced Certification.
Learn more: https://matterofwine.com/

---

subtitles: to dry lavender first harvest it by cutting it at the base of the stems just before the buds open then lay the lavender on a wooden cutting board or block of wood leave it in the sun outside or in a sunny spot in your house for about a week or until the flowers crumble easily if you'd prefer to dry the lavender inside tie it in a bunch with a rubber band then hang it upside down in a dark dry place like your garage for two to four weeks [Music] youto dry lavender first harvest it by cutting it at the base of the stems just before the buds open then lay the lavender on a wooden cutting board or block of wood leave it in the sun outside or in a sunny spot in your house for about a week or until the flowers crumble easily if you'd prefer to dry the lavender inside tie it in a bunch with a rubber band then hang it upside down in a dark dry place like your garage for two to four weeks [Music] you

subtitles: to eat an apple whole twist off the stem and eat the skin and flesh of the fruit you can eat right down to the core but most people avoid eating the actual core and seeds since they aren't as flavorful as the rest of the Apple if you don't mind the slightly bitter taste in a harder texture you can eat this part of the fruit too alternatively if you're planning on dipping your apple into a nut butter or honey slice the Apple into quarters first to make it easier to eatto eat an apple whole twist off the stem and eat the skin and flesh of the fruit you can eat right down to the core but most people avoid eating the actual core and seeds since they aren't as flavorful as the rest of the Apple if you don't mind the slightly bitter taste in a harder texture you can eat this part of the fruit too alternatively if you're planning on dipping your apple into a nut butter or honey slice the Apple into quarters first to make it easier to eat

subtitles: to choose a ripe dragon fruit look for one that is bright red or pink that gives slightly when you press on his flesh use a sharp knife to slice the dragon fruit in half then run a spoon along the edges of the skin and scoop underneath to loosen the fruit inside you can then eat the fruit whole slice it into sections or use it in a dish like a smoothie or sorbet however you should not eat the dragon fruit skin as it can give you a stomachacheto choose a ripe dragon fruit look for one that is bright red or pink that gives slightly when you press on his flesh use a sharp knife to slice the dragon fruit in half then run a spoon along the edges of the skin and scoop underneath to loosen the fruit inside you can then eat the fruit whole slice it into sections or use it in a dish like a smoothie or sorbet however you should not eat the dragon fruit skin as it can give you a stomachache

title: How To Open Durian Fruit
description: For all you new durian lovers out there!
subtitles: okay everyone this is how you open a durian what you need to do is find this little slit here this line this is where the durian grows if you cut along this line and you open it up you should find the flesh let's take a look Terra and there it is now just cut along every seam you see and repeat and you'll be eating some stinky fruit in no time this durian is so ripe even though it was previously frozen there are slits here that just toll the durian right apart look at that and here's your flesh continue this process you'll be eating durian in no timeokay everyone this is how you open a durian what you need to do is find this little slit here this line this is where the durian grows if you cut along this line and you open it up you should find the flesh let's take a look Terra and there it is now just cut along every seam you see and repeat and you'll be eating some stinky fruit in no time this durian is so ripe even though it was previously frozen there are slits here that just toll the durian right apart look at that and here's your flesh continue this process you'll be eating durian in no time

title: How to Ferment Vegetables
description:

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to ferment vegetables chop them into strips or chunks then use a meat tenderizer to press the vegetables until they start to release their juices stir in salt and pour the mixture into a fermenting vessel leaving at least three inches of space at the top of the jar if there aren't enough juices to cover the vegetables top them off with water place a weighted lid on the jar and let the ferments sit at room temperature for a few days tasting it each day until it is as tart as you like it if mold develops don't worry you can simply scrape it offto ferment vegetables chop them into strips or chunks then use a meat tenderizer to press the vegetables until they start to release their juices stir in salt and pour the mixture into a fermenting vessel leaving at least three inches of space at the top of the jar if there aren't enough juices to cover the vegetables top them off with water place a weighted lid on the jar and let the ferments sit at room temperature for a few days tasting it each day until it is as tart as you like it if mold develops don't worry you can simply scrape it off

title: How to Get an Egg Into a Bottle
description:
Learn how to get an egg into a bottle with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Get-an-Egg-Into-a-Bottle

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to get an egg into a bottle first fill a pot of water and place an egg in it then bring the water to a boil and cook the egg for 12 minutes peel the shell off of the egg once it's cool next tear off a small strip of paper and light the tip of it carefully drop the lit paper into a glass bottle if the paper stays lit quickly place the peeled egg directly in the mouth of the bottle so the opening is covered finally wait for the egg to get sucked into the bottle the air inside of the bottle expands as it heats up then contracts when the fire goes out and it cools off this change in pressure is what pulls the egg inside of the bottleto get an egg into a bottle first fill a pot of water and place an egg in it then bring the water to a boil and cook the egg for 12 minutes peel the shell off of the egg once it's cool next tear off a small strip of paper and light the tip of it carefully drop the lit paper into a glass bottle if the paper stays lit quickly place the peeled egg directly in the mouth of the bottle so the opening is covered finally wait for the egg to get sucked into the bottle the air inside of the bottle expands as it heats up then contracts when the fire goes out and it cools off this change in pressure is what pulls the egg inside of the bottle

title: How to Fish
description:
This quick video will give you some tips on how to fish!

Read more: https://www.wikihow.com/Fish

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to fish start by looking for a public lake river or pond where you won't mind spending a few hours if you live on the coast you can also fish in the ocean make sure recreational fishing is allowed in the area and research if you'll need to obtain a permit after you choose a location plan on fishing around sunrise or sunset because fish are most active at dawn and dusk before you head out you'll need to buy or rent a fishing rod and reel fishing line and hooks which you can get at a local fishing shop while you're picking up your gear stock up on some bait as well up for a synthetic bait if you don't want to handle live bait or for a more authentic experience get some worms or shrimp you could even use cheese to lure your fish to your hook if you'd prefer once you've gotten all your materials head to your fishing spot and settle in with all your gear to get started tie a hook to your fishing line and put some bait on it then cast your line out into the water and wait for something to bite be patient as getting a bite can often take some time when you feel a tug on your fishing rod pull it back quickly to hook the fish after that reeling your fishing line while pulling back on your rod until the fish is out of the waterto fish start by looking for a public lake river or pond where you won't mind spending a few hours if you live on the coast you can also fish in the ocean make sure recreational fishing is allowed in the area and research if you'll need to obtain a permit after you choose a location plan on fishing around sunrise or sunset because fish are most active at dawn and dusk before you head out you'll need to buy or rent a fishing rod and reel fishing line and hooks which you can get at a local fishing shop while you're picking up your gear stock up on some bait as well up for a synthetic bait if you don't want to handle live bait or for a more authentic experience get some worms or shrimp you could even use cheese to lure your fish to your hook if you'd prefer once you've gotten all your materials head to your fishing spot and settle in with all your gear to get started tie a hook to your fishing line and put some bait on it then cast your line out into the water and wait for something to bite be patient as getting a bite can often take some time when you feel a tug on your fishing rod pull it back quickly to hook the fish after that reeling your fishing line while pulling back on your rod until the fish is out of the water

subtitles: if you want an easy way to freeze avocado chop a ripe avocado in half and wrap the pieces in foil or plastic food wrap place each half in the freezer then remove them when they're frozen and transfer them to a resealable bag when you're ready to use the avocado let it thaw for an hour or put it in the microwave to defrost it for just under one minute you can use the pulp in guacamole or cake batterif you want an easy way to freeze avocado chop a ripe avocado in half and wrap the pieces in foil or plastic food wrap place each half in the freezer then remove them when they're frozen and transfer them to a resealable bag when you're ready to use the avocado let it thaw for an hour or put it in the microwave to defrost it for just under one minute you can use the pulp in guacamole or cake batter

title: How to Freeze Broccoli
description:
Learn how to freeze broccoli with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Freeze-Broccoli

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to freeze broccoli start by cutting it into one-inch florets then put the florets in a pot filled with water and a little bit of lemon juice cover the pot and boil the florets in the water for two minutes then transfer the florets to a bowl of ice water and let them fully cool once they're cooled off put the florets in a plastic freezer bag and store them in the freezer for up to nine monthsto freeze broccoli start by cutting it into one-inch florets then put the florets in a pot filled with water and a little bit of lemon juice cover the pot and boil the florets in the water for two minutes then transfer the florets to a bowl of ice water and let them fully cool once they're cooled off put the florets in a plastic freezer bag and store them in the freezer for up to nine months

title: How to Freeze Carrots
description:
Learn how to freeze carrots with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Freeze-Carrots

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to freeze carrots scrub them with your hands under running water to remove any dirt if you're using whole large carrots chop them into smaller pieces then blanch them by putting them in boiling water for two minutes or five minutes if using whole baby carrots remove the carrots and place them in a bowl of ice water for the same amount of time drain them spread them on a baking sheet and place them in the refrigerator until they're frozen solid then transfer the carrots to a plastic bag or container and keep for up to nine months before usingto freeze carrots scrub them with your hands under running water to remove any dirt if you're using whole large carrots chop them into smaller pieces then blanch them by putting them in boiling water for two minutes or five minutes if using whole baby carrots remove the carrots and place them in a bowl of ice water for the same amount of time drain them spread them on a baking sheet and place them in the refrigerator until they're frozen solid then transfer the carrots to a plastic bag or container and keep for up to nine months before using
